scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/**/**/**.json src/**/*.css src/public/**/**/**.html src/public/**/**/**/**/**.png src/public/**/**/**/**/**.jpg build/src/
scripts.build-ts: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-files && node build/src/app.js
scripts.only-build-ts: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-files
